# Results Viewer 
**Now golemized**

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Results Viewer(resview) lets users view the results of a simulation. The results include summary statistics, and detailed information about EV and EVSE agents. 


```{r example}
library(resview)
## basic example code
```


### Publicly hosted 
Shinyapps: https://cp84.shinyapps.io/res_view/

Please note that the 'resview' project is released with a
